name: AFPushNotificationServiceSDK
description:
The appfarms Push Notification Service SDK for iOS makes it easy for native iOS developers to send and receive push notifications and collect user engagement data form their applications. Developers can then use the appfarms Analytics reports to measure:

* The number of active users are using their applications.
* Adoption and usage of specific features.
* And many other useful metrics...
